title: Dramatic vaulted ceilings,W/D in unit, AC central, Pet Friendly
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1090 Sq.
Get ready to fall in love with Willow Creek, your new home in San Jose.
These beautiful 1 and 2 bedroom apartments are located in the Sherman Oaks neighborhood, with an eclectic variety of dining options, entertainment, and shopping close by.
Living up to the neighborhood’s name, the apartment community features landscaped grounds shaded by tall, beautiful oak trees.
On the apartment grounds itself, you’ll find a number of spacious 1 and 2 bedroom San Jose apartment floor plans to choose from, ranging up to 1230 square feet.

Inside the apartments, you’ll find an array of luxury amenities, like luxe finishes, energy-efficient stainless steel appliances, updated kitchens with breakfast bars, large walk-in closets, central heating and air conditioning, designer-inspired cabinetry, in-home full sized washers and dryers, ceiling pans, and lovely patios or balconies.
Select apartments may also include vaulted ceilings, quartz or granite countertops, wood flooring, garden windows, and premium views.

Quartz Countertops*, Dramatic vaulted ceilings*, In-home full-size washers and dryers, High speed internet available, Ceiling fans, Garden windows*, Wood flooring*, Updated kitchens with breakfast bars, Designer-inspired cabinetry, Large patios and balcony decks, New appliance package including microwave, Central heating and air conditioning, Premium views available*, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite countertops*, Spacious walk-in closets

Package receiving, Two resort-style pools and spas, Close proximity to Light Rail, Poolside wi-fi access, Pet-friendly community with pet stations, Lighted tennis courts, Landscaped courtyards, BBQ picnic area, Children's play area, Enclosed garages and covered parking available, Courtesy patrol, Easy access to Interstates 280 & 17, Controlled-access gates, Health and fitness center, Planned resident events
Photos displayed are a representation of the community but may not be of the exact apartment.
Availability and rental rates are updated daily, and conditions are subject to change without notice.
Please contact the property for current availability and pricing.
